index_video_title: Your mobile can now use AI to recognise pedestrians.
index_video_desc: No internet required. No need to manually count people with a traditional clicker. Just set up your mobile to automatically track passing foot traffic.
index_1_desc: View foot traffic counts for any time period.
index_2_desc: Simultaneously count pedestrians, cars, bicycles, and more
index_3_desc: Define custom detection zones to count traffic in specific areas.
index_4_desc: Choose to count newly appearing objects within the detection zone, or those that remain stationary.
index_desktop_desc: We also offer a desktop version. We provide versions for iOS/Android/Mac/Windows, allowing you to utilise both mobile devices and desktops with webcams. The desktop version further supports multiple video sources, enabling simultaneous counting from multiple streams.
index_desktop2_desc: In addition to mobile device cameras, we support recorded video files, webcam inputs, and internet live streams such as RTSP. This allows you to connect to existing devices and immediately begin measuring traffic flow.
app_desc: Want to know how many people pass by? This app uses your mobile's camera to intelligently identify and automatically count pedestrians. No manual input required. Say goodbye to tedious counting and easily monitor traffic flow.
video_desc: No internet required. No need to manually count people with a traditional clicker. Just set up your mobile to automatically track passing foot traffic.
